help-file.title: "SPINAL CORRUPTION"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
Using the power of his mind, the caster disrupts the victims' brains' ability to communicate with the rest of his central nervous system. This causes the victim to have trouble travelling about, and in extreme cases, makes it harder for them to escape from combat.
